name: Color Shade
description:
Submission to Minijam 111 - Colors

--Best experienced in fullscreen--

-----

This place is full of bright colors but you are being chased by your shadow.

Control the colors to find the way out!

-----

CONTROLS :

WASD/ZQSD/ARROWS: MOVEMENT

SPACEBAR : JUMP

QE / AE : CHANGE COLOR

CONTROLLER:

STICK/DPAD : MOVEMENT

SOUTH BUTTON : JUMP

BUMPERS : CHANGE COLOR
